name: KanyonKarver_GB
description:
Few simple rules:

1. Move mouse left and right to turn and reduce speed. It's just like carving on a snowboard.

2. Every New track is unique.

3. Have Fun!

Warning: It may take time for the browser to upload the Game for the first time. Patience be with you! And sorry for that ^__^

Controls:

Press [N] for a New game.

[R] to Respawn.

[P] to Pause and go to settings.
